entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pine Falls

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
